definitions.title: n.pr.f.
definitions.body: Esther (Pers. stâra, star)—daughter of Abihail, cousin and adopted daughter of Mordecai, of tribe of Benjamin; made queen in Vashti's place by Ahasuerus; her Jewish name [[הֲדַסָּת]] q.v. Es 2:7, Es 2:8, Es 2:10, Es 2:11, Es 2:15, Es 2:15, Es 2:16, Es 2:17 + 47 t. Est.
